Perplex runs to Obfucious' position.

Arrow: Coward...

----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, May 19, 2001 8:45 PM
Subject: Chivtron


> ::Obfucious::
>     He stands out of sight on the bridge watching as people get their
codes.
> He walks off to an auxiliary computer.  "He comes in and thinks he runs
this
> tech operation now.  We'll see about that."  He uses the computer to take
a
> look at the program creating and controlling the shielding codes.
> "Interesting work, I'm almost impressed."  He then sets about a flurry of
> programing to duplicate the program.  It didn't take very long because he
had
> a template by looking at Grounded's program.  He then created four codes.
He
> connected himself to the computer and downloaded one code.  With that done
he
> sets up a fire wall so that only he can get at this new program.  He opens
a
> tight band com to Aerotaur, Perplex, and Windlord.  "Please come to my
> position."  He was going to offer a code to Nightlight but he had seen her
> receive one from Grounded.
>
>
>
> Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
>
>
